definitionFile: This lang file defines the list of message names

form.minLength: {{name}} must be greater than or equal to {{length}} characters
form.maxLength: {{name}} must be less than or equal to {{length}} characters
form.gte: {{name}} must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
form.lte: {{name}} must be less than or equal {{max}}
form.newPassword: Password must contain numbers, upper and lower case letters, special characters and more than 6 characters and less than 50
form.reNewPassword: Re-enter a new password and another new password
form.username: Username is a set of characters a-z, 0-9 and can contain characters such as dot (.), underscore (_)
form.password: Password must contain characters, numbers, underscores and the first character must be a letter
form.invalidPhoneNumber: Please complete entering your phone number
form.invalidBegin: The begin must be less than end
form.invalidEnd: The end must be greater than begin
form.distanceBeginEnd: The distance between begin and end should be less than 1000
form.limitImage: The number of images uploaded is limited to {{limit}}

message.signoutConfirm: Do you want to log out?
message.foundErr: An error occurred. Please try again!
message.forgotPasswordSuccess: Request successful! We've just sent a password reset link to your email.
message.recordCreated: The data has been created successfully!
message.recordUpdated: The data has been updated successfully!
message.recordDeleted: The data has been deleted successfully!
message.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
message.activeConfirm: Are you sure you want to active this record?
message.deactiveConfirm: Are you sure you want to deactive this record?
message.recordUserCreated: The user has been created successfully!
message.recordAgentCreated: The agent has been created successfully!
message.recordTenantsCreated: The tenant has been created successfully!
message.recordRoleCreated: The role has been added successfully!
message.recordRoleUpdated: The role has been updated successfully!
message.recordRoleDeleted: The role has been deleted successfully!
message.staffInsuranceFormSuccess: The data has been created successfully!
message.staffInsuranceFormUpdateSuccess: The data has been updated successfully!
message.recordTenantsDraft: The tenant has been saved as draft successfully!
message.recordDocumentsDraftDeleted: The Draft Document has been successfully deleted!
message.recordDocumentUpdated: The document has been updated successfully!
message.recordDocumentDraftCreated: The document draft has been created successfully!
message.recordDocumentCreated: The document has been created successfully!
message.recordDocumentRejected: The document has been rejected successfully!
message.recordDocumentApproved: The document has been approved successfully!
message.recordDocumenTemplateDeleted: The document template has been deleted successfully!
message.recordDocumentTemplateCreated: The document template has been created successfully!
message.recordDocumentTemplateUpdated: The document template has been updated successfully!
message.recordUserUpdatedInfo: The user has been updated successfully! Avatar will be updated after you re-login.
message.recordDocumentTemplatesCreated: The document has been added successfully!
message.recordDocumentTemplatesUpdated: The document has been updated successfully!
message.enable2FaSuccess: 2FA has been installed successfully. You will need to re-login to continue.
message.pushDataFailed: Please enter at least one record in the table
message.saveTableBeforeSubmit: Please save the table before submitting
message.requiredFields: Please fill in the required fields
